original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says: I will listen to what Israel's people are asking me to do for them. I will allow them to grow in number, like a big crowd of sheep. They will be as many as the sheep that people brought to Jerusalem as offerings at a festival. I will fill the broken cities with crowds of people, as many as those sheep. Then they will know that I am the Lord.’
korean_text: 제사 드릴 양 떼 곧 예루살렘이 정한 절기의 양 무리 같이 황폐한 성읍을 사람의 떼로 채우리라 그리한즉 그들이 나를 여호와인 줄 알리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says:
I will listen to what Israel's people are asking me
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이스라엘 백성이 나에게 구하는 것을 들을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: I will allow them to grow in number,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들이 수적으로 늘어나게 할 것입니다,

sentences.original_text: like a big crowd of sheep.
They will be as many as the sheep
that people brought to Jerusalem as offerings at a festival.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 축제에 제물로 예루살렘으로 가져온 양들만큼요.

sentences.original_text: I will fill the broken cities with crowds of people,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 부서진 도시들을 사람들로 가득 채울 것입니다,

sentences.original_text: Then they will know that I am the Lord.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그들은 내가 주님이라는 것을 알게 될 것입니다.'
